About

Understands Your Codebase

Indexes your repository using vector embeddings to find the most relevant code for each issue.

AI Fix Suggestions

AutoDev uses large language models like GPT-4 to generate code patches and PRs for common bugs.

Issue Summarization & Labeling

Automatically classifies and summarizes issues to help maintainers stay organized.

Seamless GitHub Integration

Connect your repositories with one click via GitHub OAuth and install our GitHub App.
